      • createObjFromClassName

        public static java.lang.Object createObjFromClassName(java.lang.String className)
                                               throws BpmsFrontendException
        Accept a class name and convert it to a concrete instance of that class. If the full package format is not included (i.e. "java.util.List"), will try to add 
         java.lang
        and see if it's a basic type.
        Parameters:
        className - Name of Java class (including package) in 
                    String
        format. Is case-sensitive, and must be exact.
        Returns:
                 Object
        containing the specified class
        Throws:
        BpmsFrontendException

      • readPassword

        public static char[] readPassword(java.lang.String format,
                                  java.lang.Object... args)
                           throws BpmsFrontendException
        Imitate password entry for a system console if no system console is present. WARNING: Typing passwords into a pseudo-console using this method may not hide the password!
        Parameters:
        format - Formatting string, in 
                    String.format()
        style
        args - Additional arguments to be used by formatting string
        Returns:
        Password read from user input, in 
                 String
        format
        Throws:
        BpmsFrontendException
